name: Perfect Kick
description:
Become a star striker in Perfect Kick. Think you're the best at penalties in soccer? Put it to the test!

This app offers in-app purchases. You may restrict in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Awesome features:

• Classic penalty shootout gameplay.
• Replay classic penalty shootouts from history.
• Super simple controls that anyone can pick up and play.
• Play against real players from around the world!
• Gain XP for every match and rise through the ranks.
• Compete in weekly leader boards and find out who is king of the shootout.
• Grab new gear to upgrade your abilities!
• Win trophies as you rise up through the leagues.
• Unlock achievements as you play.
